channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: ETH can be a security and a commodity: Former CFTC commissioner
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Ether can simultaneously be a security and commodity under the regulatory scope of the SEC and CFTC, former CFTC commissioner Dan Berkovitz claimed.

item.title: Ledger key recovery service paused amid backlash, will open-source code
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: Ledger CEO Pascal Gauthier says the past week has been a “humbling experience” and apologized for the firm’s “miscommunication.”

item.title: Ethereum price is pinned below $1.9K, and data suggests that is unlikely to change in the short–term
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: 3 key indicators are behind the prolonged bearish trend in Ether, and data fails to identify an immediate catalyst for a price breakout.

item.title: Dispersion Capital launches $40M venture fund to ‘bring Web3 to the masses’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The firm aims to fund startups building infrastructure for Web3 and other decentralized technology projects.

item.title: Coinbase continues effort to get mandamus for SEC response to rulemaking petition
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange filed a petition for rulemaking with the SEC in July and was served a Wells notice for potential violations of securities law in March.

item.title: AI developer Anthropic raises $450M in Series C round
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “The funding will support our efforts to continue building AI products that people can rely on," developers wrote.

item.title: Crypto should mimic TradFi rules: Global securities regulator IOSCO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: According to the U.S. SEC, IOSCO members together regulate more than 95% of the world’s securities markets.

item.title: NFT marketplace enables cross-chain purchases on multiple networks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Nonfungible token marketplace NFTrade now supports cross-chain purchases on Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche and BNB Chain.

item.title: Bitcoin surpasses Solana to become second most popular NFT blockchain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.category: BRC-20 trading volumes put the Bitcoin blockchain in second place for NFT trading volumes
but ecosystem development must happen in order to sustain the current growth.
item.description: Bitcoin’s NFT market is growing, but it is primarily driven by newfound hype for memecoin trading on the blockchain.

item.title: Prometheum subsidiary receives FINRA approval for digital asset qualified custody
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The approval marks the first time a digital asset custody provider has come under federal regulation as the SEC tightens custody rules.

item.title: Solana integrates AI into blockchain, raises grants fund to $10M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The ChatGPT plugin integrated into Solana is open source and can be downloaded from GitHub.

item.title: CBDCs on the horizon: The current state of CBDC initiatives around the world
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: Central bank digital currencies gain traction as countries worldwide engage in their development despite skepticism from the crypto community.

item.title: Why is Ethereum (ETH) price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: why is ethereum price up today
item.description: Ethereum price is up today as traders' attention to moves to a supportive Hong Kong crypto regulation and a strong technical support level.

item.title: 8 ways crypto exchanges can help address liquidity concerns
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Crypto exchanges must take the initiative in addressing regulators’ and investors’ concerns about liquidity.

item.title: Can quantum computers mine Bitcoin faster?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Onkar Singh
item.description: Quantum computers cannot mine Bitcoin faster than classical computers, but they have the potential to do so in the future.

item.title: NFT ticketing dishes out a punch at mixed martial arts league
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: The mixed martial arts organization, Professional Fighters League, will use NFT tickets, becoming the latest sports body to explore the Web3 ticketing functionality.

item.title: Binance denies fund mismanagement allegations, calls it ‘conspiracy theory’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: A mainstream report citing multiple insiders claimed that Binance mingled customer’s funds with corporate funds at Silvergate Bank.

item.title: Regulators should focus on the benefits of crypto: European Web3 Summit 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Irakli Beridze from the UN said that, at the moment, people within the UN do not see crypto as a positive force but understand it as “something we should be worried about.”

item.title: Crypto City: Guide to Osaka, Japan’s second-biggest city
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Osaka may or may not have been Satoshi’s home, Binance has moved in, the city hosted Devcon 5, and there’s finally a Bitcoin ATM again!

item.title: Russian lawmakers propose amendments to digital ruble bill
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The bill could be changed regarding debt operations, services for non-residents and the role of the central bank.

item.title: Bitcoin ‘buys the rumor’ on US debt ceiling as BTC price nears $27.5K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price action could attempt a reclaim of $30,000, analysis says, with Bitcoin climbing through its trading range.

item.title: Portfolio management provider GoodCrypto joins Cointelegraph Accelerator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Murtuza Merchant
item.description: GoodCrypto joins a dedicated Cointelegraph support program for Web3 innovators to increase its brand value and scale up marketing efforts.

item.title: PEPE price crashes 65% in two weeks as top whales take profits — More pain ahead?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Top Pepe mania profiteers have dumped their PEPE tokens en masse, suggesting declining holding interest among whales.

item.title: Bitget secures regulatory license in Poland, reserve funds up $80M in Q1
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange secured VASP licensing in Lithuania in April.

item.title: FBI releases warning about fake crypto job advertisements
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The fake job advertisements have lured prospective employees to foreign countries, forcing participation in cryptocurrency fraud schemes.

item.title: FTX 2.0 launching soon? Court filing shows a reboot plan in the works
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The new FTX CEO has undertaken a series of meetings over the past month to work on relaunching the failed crypto exchange by entering into a bidding process.

item.title: Hong Kong to open crypto exchange access for retail users, but there’s a catch
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Hong Kong’s securities watchdog announced new plans to allow retail investor access to virtual assets platforms.

item.title: Bitcoin of America to halt operating unlicensed crypto ATMs in Connecticut
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The Department of Banking highlighted that Bitcoin of America failed to obtain a license as a money transmitter to operate Bitcoin ATM kiosks in the state.

item.title: Nifty News: Bitcoin surges to 2nd-largest NFT chain, StepN integrates Apple Pay and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Bitcoin has seen around $167.47 million in NFT sales over the past 30 days, while StepN has integrated Apple Pay to remove barriers to entry to the app.

item.title: SEC has no authority over crypto, defendants argue in $18M fraud lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Two individuals sued by the SEC for allegedly running a fake crypto mining scheme are seeking the suit's dismissal, arguing the regulator has no authority over crypto.
